name: nuclide-adb-logcat
description: A nuclide-output provider for adb logcat

pathToAdb.title: Path to adb (Android Debug Bridge) executable
pathToAdb.description: Absolute path to the adb executable on your system.

whitelistedTags.title: Tags to include
whitelistedTags.description: Messages that don't have tags that match this pattern will be ignored.
